I for one have enjoyed Jim's kantei(s).  I am wondering if the other 
membe=
rs concur and if they might like something like a regular kantei, 
possibly=
 Friday with answer on Sunday?  Or bi-weekly? Perhaps we could 
generate a =
list of those interested in submitting their treasures with 
one member bei=
ng chosen by Jim each week.  Then that party could post a 
picture with Jim=
 giving his ideas at the close of the bidding.  That 
way he'd be on the ho=
t-seat as well (although I think luke warm in his 
case at best LOL).  Just=
 some thoughts.
